name: Heather E
text: Had a great tour and tasting for our work event. Amazing bourbon. Very friendly and welcoming.

name: Blake Hargrove
text: Great place, and great staff. Jeff always has a warm smile and welcoming presence when you visit his place. His products are great, albeit hard to get, but I suppose that's the case when you make a great product. Highly recommend getting your hands on his creations if you're lucky enough.

name: Scott Seeley
text: Small distillery big of personal service. Stop in and meet the owner who rightfully is very proud of his work.

name: Jason Gilbert
text: Love this bourbon. I've had bottles from at least three batches now and it's consistently great. It can be hard to get a bottle sometimes. Check their FB page for updates on availability.
